title: Looking for geometric grotesque
content:
Hi,

I’m looking for the geometric grotesque typeface that says "Monoamine Hypothesis" on this poster: [http://payload132.cargocollective.com/1/4/137727/4945953/Neuro-F1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140714124746/http:/payload132.cargocollective.com/1/4/137727/4945953/Neuro-F1.jpg "http://payload132.cargocollective.com/1/4/137727/4945953/Neuro-F1.jpg")

Thanks in advance!
author: G.O.G.
